author: Emma Pinedo
title: Europe dares to consider easing lockdowns as U.S. enters 'peak death week'
description: European nations including hard-hit Italy and Spain have started looking ahead to easing coronavirus lockdowns after steady falls in fatality rates, as the United States prepared on Monday for what one official called "peak death week".
